ActDepartment of Human Resources and Skills Development Act
PrecisAppointment of MARGOT MARY DOUGLAS BALLAGH of Midhurst, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Social Security Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years; and designation of MARGOT MARY DOUGLAS BALLAGH of Midhurst, Ontario, to be Vice-Chairperson of the Income Security Section, effective May 6, 2013.
